article_title: Breastfeeding And Formula Feeding Moms Both Need Support, OBGYNs Say

article_metadata.author: Tara Haelle

og.description: An updated policy from the American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists recognizes that each mother "is uniquely qualified to decide whether exclusive breastfeeding, mixed feeding or formula feeding is optimal for her and her infant" but that more social support is still needed for moms who choose to breastfeed.
